oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nuzhat al-nāẓirīn fī tārīkh man waliya Miṣr min al-khulafāʼ wa-al-nāṣirīn : manuscript, 1777
Nuzhat al-nāẓirīn fī tārīkh man waliya Miṣr min al-khulafāʼ wa-al-nāṣirīn
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Karmī, Marʻī ibn Yūsuf , -1623 or 1624
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم وبه تعال قال العبد الفقير الى الله تعالاى مرعي بن يوسف الحنبلي ... :Incipit
جعلنا الله منتهى امين على يد الفقير يسين اللبدي الحنبلي غفر الله له والمسلمين. :Colophon
Written in one column, from 26 to 30 lines per page, in black ink.
According to colophon (f. 29 r), copied in 1191 AH [1777 or 8 AD] in the hand of Yāsīn al-Labadī al-Ḥanbalī.
Seal of US Naval Lyceum on f. 29v.
MS Arab 24. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Egypt--History
Egypt--Kings and rulers
